properties.entry: SELECT submittedUrl FROM jobs_feed WHERE posted_to_gfj = 1 AND DATE(posted_date)= '2022-10-09' GROUP BY company ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT uniqueid,company FROM jobs_feed WHERE posted_to_gfj != 1 AND DATE(posted_date)= '2022-10-09' GROUP BY company ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 5
